title: Mind Sundering Dagger
content:
Mind Sundering Dagger Uncommon 3~9 Damage 1d4 +1 Piercing+1d4 Psychic Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Light as thoughts themselves, this dagger is in the habit of rending them, causing significant pain, and occasional death. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 65
